attributes.action: Force the railways companies to reduce its fairs as they they are looting us
attributes.additional_details: As perlimant and governement has a power to do anything
attributes.background: Do a debate and force these companies to reduce theirs fares as  like other countries such as Australia and America and we are paying too much against nothing

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Government to set out plans for reducing rail fares
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707759
